thread.title: Anoop does the background score for Vikram’s next in Kollywood
thread.title_full: Anoop does the background score for Vikram’s next in Kollywood - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: Anoop does the background score for Vikram’s next in Kollywood
text: Kannada composer Anoop Seelin, who has two critically acclaimed soundtracks (Aatagara and Naanu Avanalla... Avalu) to his credit this year, is on an all-time high. He has just finished work on the background score for his second background score. Anoop posted on his social networking page, "Done with background score for Chiyaan Vikram's 10 Endrathukulla. It's my second movie in Tamil. Happy to work again with director Vijay Milton after Golisoda. It's an honour to work under the production of great director AR Murugadoss." Here's to another talented technician from Karnataka making it big not just in Sandalwood, but across other industries too.
